channel.title: Shops
channel.description:
i was trying to make a shop and it came up with this error
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 2000000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30)[/code]
can you guys tell me whats wrong?

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @J_Bird J Bird
item.description:
@J_Bird wrote:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "
2000000"

You can’t have 2000000 of an item in your shop just change change it to like 20000 or something lower.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Goddess Goddess
item.description:
@Goddess wrote:

maybe you have put too many items in the shop…or one of the items has too large of a quantity or something…

Read full topic
